source: ## This Notebook is used to update the SAP Data in 2 Hour Intervals incrementaly
## Load Orginal and New Temp "Incremental Data"from Blob-storage

%%pyspark
#dboIGN1
dboIGN1_temp = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/SAP_Incremental_Data/dboIGN1.parquet', format='parquet')
dboIGN1_temp.createOrReplaceTempView("dboIGN1_temp")

dboIGN1 = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/SAP/dboIGN1.parquet', format='parquet')
dboIGN1.createOrReplaceTempView("dboIGN1")

#dboJDT1
dboJDT1_temp = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/SAP_Incremental_Data/dboJDT1.parquet', format='parquet')
dboJDT1_temp.createOrReplaceTempView("dboJDT1_temp")

dboJDT1 = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/SAP/dboJDT1.parquet', format='parquet')
dboJDT1.createOrReplaceTempView("dboJDT1")

#dboRPC1
dboRPC1_temp = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/SAP_Incremental_Data/dboRPC1.parquet', format='parquet')
dboRPC1_temp.createOrReplaceTempView("dboRPC1_temp")

dboRPC1 = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/SAP/dboRPC1.parquet', format='parquet')
dboRPC1.createOrReplaceTempView("dboRPC1")
## Union Old data with the New Data

IGN1 = spark.sql("""

(SELECT *
FROM dboIGN1
EXCEPT
SELECT * FROM dboIGN1_temp)
UNION ALL
(SELECT * FROM dboIGN1_temp
EXCEPT 
SELECT * FROM dboIGN1)

""")
IGN1.createOrReplaceTempView("IGN1")

JDT1 = spark.sql("""

(SELECT *
FROM dboJDT1
EXCEPT
SELECT * FROM dboJDT1_temp)
UNION ALL
(SELECT * FROM dboJDT1_temp
EXCEPT 
SELECT * FROM dboJDT1)

""")
JDT1.createOrReplaceTempView("JDT1")

RPC1 = spark.sql("""

(SELECT *
FROM dboRPC1
EXCEPT
SELECT * FROM dboRPC1_temp)
UNION ALL
(SELECT * FROM dboRPC1_temp
EXCEPT 
SELECT * FROM dboRPC1)

""")
RPC1.createOrReplaceTempView("RPC1")

IGN1 = dboIGN1.union(dboIGN1_temp)
IGN1.createOrReplaceTempView("IGN1")

JDT1 = dboJDT1.union(dboJDT1_temp)
JDT1.createOrReplaceTempView("JDT1")

RPC1 = dboRPC1.union(dboRPC1_temp)
RPC1.createOrReplaceTempView("RPC1")
## Write new Union File Back to Blobstorage

IGN1.write.parquet('/Unstructured Data/SAP_test/dboIGN1.parquet/', mode='overwrite')

JDT1.write.parquet('/Unstructured Data/SAP_test/dboJDT1.parquet/', mode='overwrite')

RPC1.write.parquet('/Unstructured Data/SAP_test/dboRPC1.parquet/', mode='overwrite')
